Màkà United States, oke bụ 134⁰F  (56.7 °C) na Death Valley, California n'afọ 1913 na -79.8 °F (-62.1 ) edere na Prospect Creek, Alaska n'afọ  1971.
Mgbanwe okpomọkụ kachasị ukwuu e dekọrọ n'otu ébé n'ime awa irí abụọ na anọ mere n'ubochi irí na ise n'onwa Jenụwarị 1972 na Loma, Montana, mgbè okpomọkụ si na -54 ruo 49 °F (-47.8 ruo 9.4 )
Mgbanwe okpomọkụ kachasị dị egwu na-eme na ihu igwe nke North America nke ikuku Chinook nwèrè ike imetụta
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, mgbanwe okpomọkụ kachasị na nkeji abụọ nke 49  (27.2 °C) méré na Spearfish, South Dakota, ịrị elu site na -4 ruo 45 °F (−20.0 ruo 7.2 ).
N'etiti steeti US, Hawaii nwèrè ma steeti kachasị ala nke 98 °F (36.7 °C) na steeti kachasị elu nke 12.0  (−11.1 )
Ébé agwaetiti ndị dị n'oké osimiri dị ka Hawaii na-enwekarị ọnọdụ okpomọkụ kachasị ala, mgbè ụfọdụ na ọdịiche dị ka 62 °F (34.4 )
